item.title: Hello World!
item.description: This is a temporary post I can use to test the frameworks I’m using for this blog. Posts are rendered into html from markdown using Hugo. H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Alternatively, for H1 and H2, an underline-ish style: Alt-H1 Alt-H2 Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with asterisks or underscores. Combined emphasis with asterisks and underscores. Strikethrough uses two tildes. Scratch this.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Brendan. I’m an Australian software engineer with a background in web development. I listen to loads of music, play videogames with friends, and back the Swans. At other times you might find me playing tennis, jamming on a personal project, or fixing my Arch (btw) install. Hopefully you’ll find this blog filled with interesting posts about linux, web stack tech, and maybe even the occasional netsec post. If you would like to chat, tweet at me or shoot me an email.
